# Toast Container

## Usage:

```html
<p-toast-container>
    <p-toast />
</p-toast-container>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                    | Type                                                         | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `placement` | `placement` | The placement of the container | `"bottom-end" \| "bottom-start" \| "top-end" \| "top-start"` | `'top-end'` |
